name: Venture (Early)
description:
Venture is an open world dungeon crawler that I began in development for the Brackey's Game Jam and is my first official attempt at making and finishing a full game. Venture is going to have a huge overworld with lots of exploration aspects as well as tons of dungeons giving exploration reason and purpose. Lots of systems are going to be in place and there is going to be tons of things to do. This is what I'm mainly going to be working on and will be frequently updating this itch.io every time I add significant content. I am learning by the day and even if nobody cares about it I seek to make a game that I will have fun playing and have countless ideas for the future if I can get the systems set up correctly.

CONTROLS:

1 - 9  Hotbar Selection     E  Use (Bugged Use Sparingly)      Space   Attack                                 Click   Place Block     Escape   Pause

*THE INVENTORY SYSTEM IS A BIT BUGGED RIGHT NOW AS WELL AS THE PLACE DESTROY SYSTEM NOT BEING FULLY IMPLEMENTED (YES I KNOW ABOUT THE WATER)

Version 0.1 for the Jam doesn't really include the theme in any way I used the jam to get lots of work done in short time // lots more will be added later and tons will be fixed so come back and check on my progress once in a while as I slowly figure out how to develop everything solo.
